patterns: How many ICC trophies won by India
responses: The team has won five major ICC tournaments, winning the Cricket World Cup twice (1983 and 2011), the ICC T20 World Cup once (2007) and the ICC Champions Trophy twice (2002 and 2013)

patterns: World Cup won by Indian team
responses: India won the Cricket world cup in 1983 and 2011 and T20 World cup in 2007

patterns: Champion's trophy won by Indian team
responses: India won ICC Champions Trophy twice in 2002 and 2013

patterns: When India got its last ICC trophy

patterns: What do you know about Virat Kohli
responses: Yes he is a Right Handed Indian batsman born on 05 Nov 1988. he have 8074 Test runs 12344 ODI runs and 4008 T20I runs

patterns: Do you know Surya kumar Yadav
What do you know about Surya Kumar Yadav
responses: Yes he is a Right handed Indian batsman born on 14 sept 1990. Suryakumar Yadav made his first-class debut against Delhi during the 2010-11 Ranji season. he have 340 ODI runs and 1284 T20I runs. As of now he have ICC rank 1 in T20I
